attributes.action: ensure the final decision on the setting of bail conditions is returned to the senior police officers dealing with the case in question not the CPS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Seven years ago the Police lost the power to detain a person/s charged with a violent crime in custody until such time as the case comes to court. This is now reviewed by the Crown Prosecution Service. If you believe the best people to make judgement on the setting of bail conditions is the senior police officer/s investigating the crime then sign this petition
